name: Vega International
overview:
Established in the year 2011, we, “Vega International” are involved in manufacturing, supplying and exporting of a wide range of supreme quality Elevation Digital Tiles, Glossy Digital Tiles, Exclusive Designer Tiles, Silk Matt Digital Tiles, Kitchen Ware Tiles.

Our Products : Botticino Dark Tiles 600x300 Silk Matt Gravely Dark Tiles 600X300 Silk matt Adaro Blue Tiles 450x300 Glossy Digital Strips Choco Tiles 600x300 Elevation Adaro Pink Dark Tiles 450x300 Glossy Digital Brick So Brown Tiles 450x300 Elevation Digital Adaro Blue Light Tiles 450 x 300 Glossy Digital Adaro Multi Dark Tiles - 450x300 Glossy Digital

Our Team: We are very proud to have a horde of competent and experienced professionals, who work in coordination with the clients and bring forth a range of high quality tiles. We have developed a strict hiring policy, which ensures that highly talented and deserving candidates get to join our organization.

Infrastructure: We have designed and developed a vast infrastructural set up, which is well equipped to handle large scale production of a variety of tiles. This infrastructure has a well equipped manufacturing, which enables us to accept bulk orders of different products.

Quality Assurance: We are committed to provide high quality products to our valued patrons. In order to fulfill this commitment, we have developed a well equipped quality control unit. This unit has a team of quality auditors which keeps a watchful eye on the entire manufacturing process.

Client Satisfaction: The prime motto of our organization is to offer utmost customer satisfaction. In order to fulfill this motto we offer a range of high quality products to our clients.

Why Us?: We have gained remarkable accolades in the industry by assuring following attributes: Authentic vendor base Efficient workforce
